Address.Address1: 27 QUOC TU GIAM STREET, DONG DA DISTRICT

Description.Text:
Property Location
Eastin Easy GTC Hanoi is in the heart of Hanoi, walking distance from Temple of Literature and Vietnam National Museum of Fine Arts. This hotel is within close proximity of Embassy of Singapore and National Museum of Fine Arts.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 70 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This Art Deco hotel also features babysitting/childcare (surcharge), supervised childcare/activities, and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Temple of Literature - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Vietnam National Museum of Fine Arts - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Embassy of Singapore - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
National Museum of Fine Arts - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Lenin Park - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Embassy of China - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Hanoi War Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Flag Tower of Hanoi - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Vietnam Military History Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Hoa Lo Prison Museum - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Hang Da Market - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Hanoi Citadel - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Vietnamese National Tuong Theatre - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
One Pillar Pagoda - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
St. Joseph Cathedral - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi

The preferred airport for Eastin Easy GTC Hanoi is Hanoi (HAN-Noi Bai Intl.) - 21.2 km / 13.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
